column5: Heading up on Tuesday the 17th to fish Big V. for a couple days and then on to Mahkwa on Lac Seul. We plan to either trailer over to Deception, but figure that would be a pretty long round trip, or, just boat up to Bear and Chamberlain. Any idea about boat time from Mahkwa to Bear and Chamberlain averaging 30mph. How about ideas for Big Vermillion, Lures, areas to try etc.?
